Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a featured post in the portfolio.

platform.description: The social media platform the post is from (e.g., LinkedIn, Instagram).

description.description: A short description or summary of the post.

link.description: A URL to the original post.

image.description: A URL to an image for the post.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project in the portfolio.

id.description: Unique identifier for the project entity.

description.description: A short description of the project.

techStack.description: An array of strings representing the technologies used in the project.

githubLink.description: Link to the GitHub repository of the project.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Represents a work experience entry in the portfolio.

id.description: Unique identifier for the experience entity.

title.description: The job title of the experience.

company.description: The name of the company where the experience was gained.

startDate.description: The start date of the experience.

endDate.description: The end date of the experience. Can be null if it's the current job.

descriptionPoints.description: An array of strings representing the key bullet points for the role.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skill entity.

name.description: The name of the skill (e.g., Angular, React, Python).

category.description: The category of the skill (e.g., Languages, Frameworks, Cloud).

id.description: Unique identifier for the education entity.

degree.description: The name of the degree (e.g., Bachelor of Science).

awards.description: An array of strings representing any notable awards or certifications.

/posts/{postId}.description: Stores featured post data. Publicly readable, but only writable by authenticated admins.

/users/{userId}/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project data owned by a specific user. Authorization is based on path ownership. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/experience/{experienceId.description: Stores experience data owned by a specific user. Authorization is based on path ownership. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/skills/{skillId}.description: Stores skill data owned by a specific user. Authorization is based on path ownership. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.

/users/{userId}/education/{educationId}.description: Stores education data owned by a specific user. Authorization is based on path ownership. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.
